properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT RB.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, COUNT, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_PHOTO_ADDRESS || '/' || REVIEW_PHOTO_CHANGENAME "TITLE_IMG", FILELEVEL FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_PHOTO ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO = TB_REVIEW_PHOTO.REVIEW_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE TB_REVIEW_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO DESC)RB) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW_BOARD ( REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, ? )

INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW_PHOTO ( REVIEW_PHOTO_NO, REVIEW_PHOTO_ORIGINNAME, REVIEW_PHOTO_CHANGENAME, REVIEW_PHOTO_ADDRESS, REVIEW_NO, STATUS, FILELEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_PHOTO_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_REVIEW_NO.CURRVAL, DEFAULT, ? )
